name: profs-letter
effect: Traded to the player’s mom for the Town Map and a Potion.
short_effect: Traded to the player’s mom for the Town Map and a Potion.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A letter that Professor Sycamore wrote to your mother. A faint but pleasant perfume seems to cling to the paper.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A letter that Professor Sycamore wrote to your mother. A faint but pleasant perfume seems to cling to the paper.
